sentences.sContent: I have had nephritis, but that was five years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have had nephritis, but that was five years ago.
sentences.sCn: 我有过肾炎，但那是五年前的事了。

sentences.sContent: Objective:To seek early diagnosis of lupus nephritis .
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective:To seek early diagnosis of lupus nephritis .
sentences.sCn: 目的：探索狼疮性肾炎的早期诊断。

sentences.sContent: Complications may include abscess, nephritis, and rheumatic fever. Tonsils that become chronically inflamed and enlarged require surgical removal (tonsillectomy).
sentences.sContent_eng: Complications may include abscess, nephritis, and rheumatic fever. Tonsils that become chronically inflamed and enlarged require surgical removal (tonsillectomy).
sentences.sCn: 脓疮、肾炎和风湿热。扁桃腺可形成慢性炎症及肥大，需手术切除（扁桃腺切除）。
